name: Danish Pastry Apple Bars
author: Nancy
summary: This recipe is excellent! I also use the crust recipe for round fruit pies.
ingredients: 10  apples - peeled, cored and thinly sliced
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C
) In a large bowl, combine flour and salt
Cut in shortening until mixture resembles coarse crumbs
Beat egg yolk in measuring cup and add enough milk to make 2/3 cup total liquid
Stir into flour mixture until all flour is damp
On floured surface, roll half the dough into a rectangle and fit into a 9x13 inch pan
In large bowl, combine apples, brown sugar, white sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg
Roll out remaining dough and place over apples
Seal edges and cut slits in top dough
Beat egg white till frothy and brush on crust
Bake in the preheated oven for 50 minutes, or until golden brown
